name: Export Featured Images
author: timersys

sections.description: Simple and basic plugin that let you export Featured images from posts or custom post types into a WordPress xml so you can import them in other sites using the WordPress importer tool
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins > Add New
  2. Click the Upload link
  3. Click Browse and locate the featured-images.x.x.zip file
  4. Click Install Now
  5. After WordPress installs, click on the Activate Plugin link

You’re done!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New
  2. Click the Upload link
  3. Click Browse and locate the featured-images.x.x.zip file
  4. Click Install Now
  5. After WordPress installs, click on the Activate Plugin link

You’re done!

Where do I find this great tool in my wp-admin?

Just go to Tools-> Export Featured images

description: Simple and basic plugin that let you export Featured images from posts or custom post types into a WordPress xml so you can import them in other sites using the WordPress importer tool
